text: 12:10 Onger Akaba 34:7; Daniel 6:22; Aposel 5:19; Hibru 1:14; 2 Pita 2:9Aning ghuava, kalabusɨn dɨpenimɨn garir gumazir pumuning gitagha, ghua kalabusɨn zuir ainɨn tiar akar nguibar ekiamɨn zuimɨn oto. Aning an otozɨ, tiam uabɨ kuiaghirɨzɨma, aning azenan ghua tuavir mamɨn zui. Aning mong saghon ghua, ensel zuamɨra Pita ategha ghu.
